column5: Away from hustle and bustle, yet close enough to get anywhere quickly. 5min from restaurants, grocery and movies, 15min from Stockyards, 20min from TCU, downtown, 7th street, Sundance. 30min from DFW Airport, Motor Speedway, Ranger's and Cowboy Stadium. Good for groups, couples, parents&students, business travelers, short or long stays!
column8: Cozy Cottage right on the Lake!
